text: La Mazzanta is a resort town in Tuscany, central Italy, in the comune of Rosignano Marittimo, province of Livorno. At the time of the 2001 census its population was 148. Popolazione residente - Livorno (dettaglio loc. abitate) - Censimento 2001, Istat. The town is about 30 km from Livorno and 12 km from Rosignano Marittimo. == References == == Bibliography == * Category:Frazioni of the Province of Livorno
title: La Mazzanta
